title: "World's first self-driving electric passenger ferry begins service in Stockholm"
excerpt: "The world's first autonomous, electric passenger ferry service has begun operations in the city of Stockholm in Norway this week. The ferry, christened MF Estelle, by Zeabus, currently has a crew onboard but will be operated unmanned starting next year, a press release said."
